description: This file provides functions for interacting with Google Maps Places API to find nearby gas stations and compute distances, either using Distance Matrix API or fallback to Haversine formula.

methods.name: searchNearbyGasStations({ google, location, radius = 5000, limit = 50 })
methods.description: Searches for nearby gas stations around a given location using Google Maps Places API.

methods.name: compileDistancesIfEnabled
methods.description: Computes distances between origins and places, using Distance Matrix API if enabled and fallback to Haversine formula.

ctags.name: computeDistancesIfEnabled
ctags.pattern: /^export async function computeDistancesIfEnabled({ google, origins = [], places = [], flags = {} /

ctags.name: searchNearbyGasStations
ctags.pattern: /^export function searchNearbyGasStations({ google, location, radius = 5000, limit = 50 }) {$/
